name: Brian Ji
bio: Brian has served in sports administration for 12 years and champions grassroots development across Asia.

name: Gihun Seong
bio: Gihun focuses on coach education and youth programs, with a background in sports science.

name: Siti Nurhaliza
bio: Siti directs the events calendar and regional partnerships, with experience organizing multi-city competitions.

name: Rahul Singh
bio: Rahul oversees rules, refereeing standards, and competition integrity.
